commit.message:
Properly detect Atom, Core 2 and Core i7.

2010-05-09  H.J. Lu  <hongjiu.lu@intel.com>

	PR target/44046
	* config/i386/driver-i386.c (host_detect_local_cpu): Properly
	detect Atom, Core 2 and Core i7.

From-SVN: r159202
